law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 288, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 6, sec. 25, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 235, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 336, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 229, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1994; ch. 405, sec. 61, effective July 15, 1994; and ch. 416, sec. 15, effective July 15, 1994. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 1, effective July 13, 1984.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/94). This section was amended by 1994 Ky. Acts chs. 229, 405, and 416. Where these Acts are not in conflict, they have been codified together. These three Acts conflict as to subsection (4) of this section, and Acts ch. 416, which was the last of the three Acts enacted by the General Assembly, prevails under KRS 446.250.
